title: Riot minimap is to small :(
body: I can't help but feel like the new minimap is too small. i don't think its much smaller than it was before, but I feel like it'd at least be nice if there was an option to scale it up at least about 20% larger. my vision is pretty terrible at about 20/50 when my face is near the screen, so i was wondering if riot would consider making options for both minimap size and font scaling with people with terrible vision in mind. otherwise i think the new UI is good.
